title: Information Books and Research

vocab.definition: Books about real things, not made-up stories
Looking for information about a topic

teachingNotes: Use simple nonfiction books with lots of pictures. Practice finding specific information. Compare fiction and nonfiction books.

sample.question: Where would you look to find facts about elephants?

truefalse.question: Nonfiction books tell about real things.
expectedAny: nonfiction books contain facts and real information

multiplechoice.question: Which book would help you learn about dinosaurs?
expectedAny: information books contain facts about topics

fillintheblank.question: When you want to learn about something, you do _____.

shortanswer.question: What is one fact you learned from an information book?
expectedAny: any factual information from nonfiction books
